reviewText: Great instruction put to a fun theme!!  It has been watched at least 30 times already!!

Its a great video to show 2nd and 3rd graders. I teach bicycle safety and the kids love it. We have used this video for years because it re-enforces what we teach in the classroom about bike safety. Its a classic, but still a goodie.

The fact that I still know every song in this video after having seen it when I was six should tell you how *well* this thing teaches bicycle safety.
A must for anyone with children, anyone who baby-sits, or anyone who just needs to see eight-year-olds rapping on their bicycles.
